name: Mouse VS Louse: in super screw them over ! featuring the hinder-bug: The Louse That Causes Problems.
name_original: Mouse VS Louse: in super screw them over ! featuring the hinder-bug: The Louse That Causes Problems.
description: A simple and quick real time puzzler where you add blocks to a maze to stop a mouse from getting to the coveted cheese. The mouse's failure is your progress! 10 unique levels with several cool mechanics.
